alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:14PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms and an outflow boundary will impact portions of north central Judith Basin, northwestern Fergus and eastern Chouteau Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 713 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Geraldine, or 27 miles southeast of Fort Benton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Benton, Geraldine, Loma, Iliad, Virgelle and Square Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
